DefaultStorageClass.description: The default storage class for objects put into an Amazon S3 bucket by a file gateway. Possible values are S3_STANDARD or S3_STANDARD_IA. If this field is not populated, the default value S3_STANDARD is used. Optional.

FileShareARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file share to be updated.

KMSEncrypted.description: True to use Amazon S3 server side encryption with your own AWS KMS key, or false to use a key managed by Amazon S3. Optional.

KMSKey.description: The KMS key used for Amazon S3 server side encryption. This value can only be set when KmsEncrypted is true. Optional.

NFSFileShareDefaults.description: The default values for the file share. Optional.
